Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: 元・戦士の男の人
Entry.EnglishText: Ex-Warrior

Entry.JapaneseText: notice
Entry.EnglishText: Notice

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の子
Entry.EnglishText: Boy

Entry.JapaneseText: 女の子
Entry.EnglishText: Girl

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の人
Entry.EnglishText: Man

Entry.JapaneseText: 体育館
Entry.EnglishText: Gymnasium

Entry.JapaneseText: ミナール
Entry.EnglishText: Minal

Entry.JapaneseText: ミナール・体育館
Entry.EnglishText: Minal - Gymnasium

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>今、おぬしたちは<unk17:340480>種類の敵を <Cyan>コンプリート<White>しておるな。
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000002>Currently, you've <Cyan>catalogued<White> <unk17:340480> monster entries.

Entry.JapaneseText: では頼んだぞ、若者たちよ！
Entry.EnglishText: Well then, I'll be counting on you, young'uns!

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>おおおおおおお！ なんと、全<unk17:340480>種類の敵を 全て<Cyan>コンプリート<White>したようだな！
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000002>Wow! You've finished <Cyan>cataloguing<White> all <unk17:340480> monster entries!
Entry.Notes: not sure if it's divided by individual monster or monster class, but I believe it's the first.

Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.Notes: DON'T EDIT THIS, IT'S A DUMMY ENTRY

Entry.JapaneseText: ワシからの感謝のしるしだ。 遠慮なく受け取ってくれ。
Entry.EnglishText: Here, this is a token of my appreciation. You've earned it.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green>１００万ガルドの賞金を手に入れました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green>Obtained 1000000 gald.

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>おお、なんと、<unk17:340480>の種類の敵を <Cyan>コンプリート<White>したようだな！
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000002>Wow! You've <Cyan>catalogued<White> <unk17:340480> monster entries!

Entry.JapaneseText: ワシからの感謝のしるしだ。 遠慮なく受け取ってくれ。 とっておきの逸品じゃ。
Entry.EnglishText: Here, this is a token of my appreciation. This one's a real special item. You've earned it.
Entry.Notes: not sure what he actually gives out.

Entry.JapaneseText: ワシはバイラスや強者たちの データを集める事を生業と してきた男だ。
Entry.EnglishText: I have devoted my life to gathering data on monsters and especially formidable adversaries.

Entry.JapaneseText: しかし、半年前に腰と くるぶしを痛めての。 もう世界中を旅して 回る事はできん。
Entry.EnglishText: However, I injured my hip and ankles about half a year ago, and I haven't been able to travel the world and do my job since then.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……なんと？ もしや、 おぬしらバトルブックを 持ってないか？
Entry.EnglishText: ...Hold on, could it be? Is that a battle book in your possession?

Entry.JapaneseText: そうかそうか。 ワシの意思を継いでくれるとは 感心な若者だ。
Entry.EnglishText: How impressive! It's reassuring to know that the younger generation will be continuing the good work in my stead.

Entry.JapaneseText: 同じ敵と戦闘を重ねたり、 連続ヒットを決めたり、 アイテムを獲得する事で、 敵一覧のデータは埋まっていく。
Entry.EnglishText: By repeatedly battling the same foes, scoring consecutive hits, and acquiring items, the entries in their list will gradually be completed.

Entry.JapaneseText: そうして攻略度を１００まで溜めて <Cyan>コンプリート<White>した数に応じて、 ワシから感謝のしるしを 贈ろうではないか。
Entry.EnglishText: On your way to full completion, how about I reward you for your performance? Come speak to me as you make progress, and I'll reward you accordingly.

Entry.JapaneseText: では頼んだぞ、若者たちよ！
Entry.EnglishText: Well then, I'll be counting on you, young'uns!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマのせいで、 外に出られなくなったんだぞ！
Entry.EnglishText: We can't go out anymore because of those Gajuma! It's not fair!
Entry.Notes: i don't know how old he is. alternate if he's a little kid: I can't go out to play anymore because of those Gajuma! It's not fair!

Entry.JapaneseText: なんでヒューマだけ 外出ちゃダメなんだろ？
Entry.EnglishText: Why do only Huma have to stay home?

Entry.JapaneseText: コワイよ…… どうなっちゃうの？
Entry.EnglishText: I'm scared... What's going to happen?

Entry.JapaneseText: もしもの時は 私が守ってあげるから、 大丈夫。
Entry.EnglishText: Don't worry, I'll protect you if something happens. Everything's going to be okay.

Entry.JapaneseText: この前の大揺れの時、棚から ツボが落ちて割れたんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: When that big tremor came, pots and jars fell from the shelf and shattered on the floor.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、どうして、 ボクたちが掃除を……？
Entry.EnglishText: But why are we the ones who have to clean it all up?

Entry.JapaneseText: 図書館ってさ、どうして むずかしい本しかないのかな？
Entry.EnglishText: Why's the library filled up with nothing but boring, stuffy books?

Entry.JapaneseText: 『ポチョムさんとんち話』を 読みたいのになぁ……！
Entry.EnglishText: When really, all I want to read is 'The Tale of Pochom', man.
Entry.Notes: might be an Astro Boy reference.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんで外出ちゃダメなの？ 私、何もやってないのにさ。
Entry.EnglishText: Why can't I leave? I haven't done anything wrong.

Entry.JapaneseText: 何が…… あったのかしら……？
Entry.EnglishText: Did... Something happen?

Entry.JapaneseText: 空ごと地面がガタガタッて 揺すられてるみたいだったね。
Entry.EnglishText: It feels like the sky and ground were shaking.

Entry.JapaneseText: 窓ガラスが 割れちゃうかと思った……
Entry.EnglishText: I thought my window was going to break...

Entry.JapaneseText: 図書館や本屋さんに行くと すぐにトイレに行きたく なっちゃうのよね。
Entry.EnglishText: Whenever I enter a bookstore, I feel this sudden urge to go to the restroom.
Entry.Notes: also known as the Mariko Aoki phenomenon https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mariko_Aoki_phenomenon

Entry.JapaneseText: なんでかな？ 本のにおいかな？
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder why... Is it the way books smell?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『体育館ご利用の皆さまへ』 汗をかいても裸にならないでください。 特に男性の方は、充分ご注意ください。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>TO ALL USERS OF THE GYM: even if you get sweaty, please do NOT take off your clothes. Especially, male individuals. You have been warned.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『いろいろな大会の優勝カップ』 ・第一回ミナール市民マラソン大会 ・第百回ミナール早食い大会 ……など。
Entry.EnglishText:
<speed:0>An assortment of championship cups:
* Inaugural Minal Cittizens Marathon;
* Minal Citizens Speed Eating Contest (100th
edition);
...And so on and forth.
Entry.Notes: initially I had Minarl because of the elongated vowel.

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、あの本か！ もう返却日過ぎてたのか。 すっかり忘れてたよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Ooh, that book! I guess the returned date already passed. I completely missed it.

Entry.JapaneseText: わざわざ来てくれてありがとう！ はい。この本だよ。 司書さんによろしく！
Entry.EnglishText: Thank you for coming all this way! Here, it's this book. Give the librarian my regards!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green>『歴史小説』を回収しました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green>Historical novel retrieved.
Entry.Notes: or "[Historical Novel] retrieved." idk how you want to do the brackets.

Entry.JapaneseText: スポーツ大好きっ子は 大歓迎だけど……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm all in for active and sporty girls, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: 地面がスポーツするのは ちと困るよねえ……
Entry.EnglishText: When the ground starts getting sporty too, it's a whole different ball game, you know?

Entry.JapaneseText: 人は外に出て 体を動かさなきゃ いけないのさ！
Entry.EnglishText: People can't live cooped up in their homes all the time!

Entry.JapaneseText: なのに、外に出ちゃ いけないなんて…… 拷問に近いね。
Entry.EnglishText: Just tell me, why the heck can't we go outside? This is literally torture.

Entry.JapaneseText: やあ！ スポーツしているかい！
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, you! Do you like sports?
